items.text: fullish, close to off stump, transfers his weight nicely forward to punch to extra-cover
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: overpitched on off stump and Mushfiq's placement is perfect on this occasion. Waited a tiny bit longer and opened his bat face just a touch to drive to the left of the diving extra-cover fielder
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball outside off stump and he beats Mushfiq's outside edge without necessarily doing a great deal with the ball. Mushfiq was a little slow getting forward, and ended up pushing uncertainly at the ball
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: fuller, wider, slashed away to the right of third man. Was in the air for a bit but was always dipping down before reaching the fielder
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: fullish outside off, punched to extra-cover
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText:
Double change. Here's Mohammad Nawaz, from left-arm round. Long-off is back, and, I think, deep backward square leg too.

Ashik: "This two have to spend time in the crease as Mahmudullah and Imrul did against Afghanistan."
items.text: big appeal after he strikes the pad with an arm ball, not given out. Seemed to be heading down leg, and Pakistan make a late decision to review after a long consultation between bowler and keeper/captain... The length trapped him on the crease in defence, and the lack of turn beat the inside edge, but that's a shocking review. The ball has struck his pad outside leg stump!
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: nicely bowled, fairly quick, drifting in towards middle stump. Wanted to drive to long-off, and ended up playing it back to the bowler as a result
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: down the track but can't reach the pitch of this. Flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full on middle and off, driven back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: fired in quick on leg stump, clipped to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length ball angling into middle and off, defended into the on side after taking half a stride forward
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: angling in from outside off, and the length ball is steered to point with the bat's open face for a single
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: bowls a heavy ball full on off stump, and he frees his arms to clatter a drive through to the sweeper fielder on the off side
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length ball outside off, and he tries to punch this to cover. Comes off the bat's outside-half, and dribbles away to deep point
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length ball landing just outside off, and he pushes this off the front foot to cover point. Four singles in a row
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: edged! And there's no slip fielder to gobble that up. Just wide outside off, and he tries to drive this ball through the covers. The delivery's not full enough, and therefore it takes the bat's outside edge. Past Sarfraz's right for a boundary
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: full on middle, and this is tapped off the front foot to mid on. No chance of a single on this occasion
items.postText: JB: "Hassan being off-color is a bigger concern for me than Amir,,,I hope he gets his groove back in this match."
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and he guides this off his pads to short fine leg. Says no to the single
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: tossed up on middle stump, and he takes a big stride forward to caress this towards the non-striker
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on off, and he goes down on one knee to slog-sweep! But the ball takes an inside edge, and ricochets onto his front leg before dribbling behind the keeper
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and this is firmly driven to wide long off for a walking single
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full on off once again. No spin on this surface for now. Tapped off the front foot to cover point, and he wants the single. But the non-striker shouts 'no'
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and he comfortably nudges this to the vacant square-leg region for a quick run
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length ball on the fourth-stump line, but angling into the batsman. He goes onto the back foot, and fends from near his chest
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and Mushfiqur check-drives off the front foot. Beats the cover-point fielder and trickles away to the man in the deep
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run
